Document.name: Hostels in Bangkok, Thailand
Document.description: Listing of hostels, hotels, apartments, bed and breakfasts, guesthouses in Bangkok. More information about these hostels at Bangkok Hostels

Placemark.name: NapPark Hostel
Placemark.description:
If you are budget-mind traveler and looking for a unique place to stay in Bangkok with very reasonable prices, NapPark Hostel at Khao San is a newly renovated must-stay hostel experience in Bangkok.
More information

Book online : NapPark Hostel
See more : Hostels in Bangkok, Thailand

Placemark.name: Refill Now! Hostel
Placemark.description:
Welcome to REFILL NOW! In Bangkok, the high-style low-cost place that promises to fill your stay with memorable moments! We offer a hip and innovative traveling and living experience to backpackers and budget travelers taking a break in one of Southeast Asia's most exciting metropolises.
More information

Book online : Refill Now! Hostel
See more : Hostels in Bangkok, Thailand

Placemark.name: Urban House
Placemark.description:
Urban House, opened in February 2006, is located on Saladaeng, Silom - the heart of Bangkoks business, tourist and entertainment district.
More information

Book online : Urban House
See more : Hostels in Bangkok, Thailand

Placemark.name: Sivalai Place Apartments
Placemark.description:
Suburban Oasis for rent? The best kept secret hostel in Bangkok! Experience the real traditional Thai lifestyle & enjoy the lovely environment with us and local Thais!
More information

Book online : Sivalai Place Apartments
See more : Hostels in Bangkok, Thailand
